pageContent: Purpose: The outcome of patients with advanced prostate cancer undergoing palliative transurethral resection of the prostate (TURP) is not well defined in the literature. We determined the preoperative characteristics, operative morbidity and postoperative outcomes of patients with advanced prostate cancer undergoing palliative TURP and compared these outcomes to those of patients undergoing TURP for benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH).

metaData.source:
Communicating Value in Health Care Using Radar Charts: A Case Study of Prostate Cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27577622/
